    • Content

      /** 
Analysis for the paper
@author Allcott and Taubinsky
@otherinfo Evaluating Bahviorally Motivated Policy: Experimental Evidence from the Lightbulb Market
*/
/* LightbulbsAnalysis.do */
/* This is the master file for the analysis in Allcott and Taubinsky  */

clear matrix
clear mata
clear all
set more off
local me =c(username)
cd "C:/Users/`me'/My Documents/Allcott and Taubinsky - Lightbulbs - Replication"


capture cd "C:/Users/`me'/My Documents/Allcott and Taubinsky - Lightbulbs - Replication/Analysis/" // Change this to your proper folder


// This is the in-store experiment
//include Code/LightbulbsDataPrep.do // Note: This will not run because we cannot  post some of the original underlying microdata.
include Code/LightbulbRegressions.do

// This is the TESS experiment
include Code/TESSLightbulbsDataPrep.do
include Code/TESSStatementsinPaper.do
include Code/TESSLightbulbsRegressions.do
include Code/TESSLightbulbsGraphs.do 
include Code/TESSWelfareCalculation.do
include Code/TESSEPMvsCATE.do
include Code/TESSExcessMassTest.do



statdoc
